description: Creative professional specializing in visual design across digital and print mediums, including branding, UI/UX, graphic design, and illustration with focus on portfolio development and multi-platform content strategy

SKL-DES-002.skill_phrase: published comprehensive case studies on Behance

SKL-DES-003.skill_phrase: designed high-fidelity UI shots for Dribbble

SKL-DES-005.skill_phrase: integrated AI tools ethically in design workflow

SKL-DES-006.skill_phrase: created accessible and inclusive design content

SKL-DES-007.skill_phrase: documented design process through screen recordings

SKL-DES-008.skill_phrase: curated visual content boards on Pinterest

tool_details.TOOL-SMM-001: Instagram - PRIMARY platform (daily use) - Carousels, Reels, Stories
tool_details.TOOL-PORT-001: Behance - PRIMARY platform (monthly use) - Comprehensive case studies
tool_details.TOOL-DESIGN-001: Dribbble - PRIMARY platform (weekly use) - High-fidelity shots
tool_details.TOOL-SMM-005: Pinterest - SECONDARY platform (weekly use) - Infographics, visual boards
tool_details.TOOL-SMM-007: LinkedIn - SECONDARY platform (weekly use) - Professional networking
tool_details.TOOL-SMM-008: The Dots - PRIMARY for clients (ongoing) - UK/EU creative network
tool_details.TOOL-PORT-002: ArtStation - PRIMARY for illustration (monthly use) - Industry professionals
tool_details.TOOL-SMM-009: Cara - NICHE (monthly use) - Human-only anti-AI portfolio

workflow_details.WF-SMM-003: Instagram Content Strategy for Designers - Daily content mix (Carousels, Reels, Stories)
workflow_details.WF-SMM-004: Behance Project Publishing - Monthly comprehensive case studies
workflow_details.WF-SMM-005: Dribbble Shot Posting - Weekly high-fidelity UI shots (2-4/week)
workflow_details.WF-SMM-001: Cross-Platform Content Distribution - Repurpose Behance to Instagram/Pinterest/LinkedIn
workflow_details.WF-SMM-002: Content Repurposing Pipeline - Transform long-form to multiple platform variations

object_details.OBJ-SMM-006: Instagram Story - Interactive Q&A, polls, BTS content
object_details.OBJ-PORT-001: Behance Project - Comprehensive case study with 6-step structure
object_details.OBJ-SMM-010: LinkedIn Article - Professional design insights, case study highlights

template_details.TMPL-SMM-001: Instagram Carousel Template - Educational design content format
template_details.TMPL-SMM-002: Instagram Caption Template - Portfolio showcase captions
template_details.TMPL-SMM-006: Behance Project Description Template - 6-step case study narrative

typical_tasks: Create 3-5 Instagram carousel posts per week (educational content)
Produce 2-4 Instagram Reels per week (process videos)
Publish 1 comprehensive Behance case study per month
Share 2-4 Dribbble shots per week (UI components, designs)
Curate 5-10 Pinterest pins per week (visual references, infographics)
Document design process through screen recordings weekly
Engage with design community daily (comments, appreciations)

performance_metrics.behance_appreciations: Community validation and featured project potential

best_practices: Post 3-5 Instagram feed posts per week + daily Stories
Create saveable educational content (5x algorithm weight)
Use 3-5 niche-specific hashtags on Instagram (not 30 generic)
Publish 1 comprehensive Behance project monthly (quality over quantity)
Follow 6-step Behance structure: Challenge → Ethics → Process → Accessibility → Solution → Impact
Always show AI workflow: Human input → AI assistance → Human refinement
Never post raw AI output without human curation
Document process through screen recordings and iterations
Highlight inclusive design and accessibility features
Cross-promote Behance projects via Instagram carousel previews
Optimize for saves and shares (reference-worthy content)
Curate Pinterest boards for long-term discovery
Network professionally on The Dots for UK/EU client acquisition

ai_integration_approach.transparency: Always show human + AI collaboration workflow
ai_integration_approach.process: Human concept → AI assistance → Human curation → Human refinement → Final result

platform_sensitivity.general: AI as assistant narrative, not replacement

ai_integration_approach.documentation: Screen record workflow showing tool usage and human decisions
